response.answer_text: Gramophone is an agriculture-based start-up which aims at helping farmers in maximizing their production and profit, by providing them easy solutions to all kind of problems related to farming. The best thing about this process is that the farmers don’t need to travel to distant places looking for help, because gramophone provides all farming solutions to the farmers on their phones only. Started by IIT graduates in 2016, Gramophone is known for providing the right inputs to farmers along with various agronomy services throughout the entire cropping cycle. It also provides top-quality seeds, fertilizers, and many other products related to agriculture. Please watch this video for more information-  Thanks for reding.
